text:
<!everyone> hey folks! last job roundup of the year. here ya go!
---
:tv: = includes a video Q&A
:zap:️ = new this week
---
:star:*️ featured full-time roles:*
---
• Joonko Diversity is hiring a Senior Content Marketing Manager :tv: (:wave: <@UV5V2P0VB>)
• Verblio is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/219408-content-marketing-manager-verblio|Content Marketing Manager> (:wave: <@U02EL2NBYGL>)
• Appcues is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/218016-content-marketing-manager-appcues|Content Marketing Manager>
• Brief Media is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/216957-director-digital-content-and-audience-growth-brief-media|Director, Digital Content & Audience Growth>
• OnBoard is hiring an <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/218900-seo-and-content-specialist-onboard|SEO & Content Specialist> (:wave: <@U01QV2VLNMQ>)
• Aha Media Group is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/202376-content-strategist-aha-media-group|Content Strategist> :tv:
• Omniscient Digital is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/213553-managing-editor-and-operations-lead-omniscient-digital|Managing Editor & Operations Lead> :tv: :zap:️ (:wave: <@U0191E456RE> <@U01997SMK0F>)
• Very Good Marketing Agency is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/216211-content-strategist-very-good-marketing-agency|Content Strategist> :zap:️
• Shopify is hiring a Content Marketing Lead, Developer Ecosystem :tv: (:wave: <@U02Q4CD6N1K>)
• Pinwheel is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/212267-content-marketing-specialist-pinwheel|Content Marketing Specialist>
• Panther is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/208592-director-of-content-marketing-panther|Director of Content Marketing> :tv:
• Ascend is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/141859-content-lead-ascend|Content Lead> :tv:
• Animalz is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/190944-content-team-lead-animalz|Content Team Lead>, <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/19186-content-marketing-manager-animalz|Content Marketing Manager>, <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/211627-content-marketing-editor-animalz|Content Marketing Editor> and a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/211628-customer-success-manager-animalz|Customer Success Manager>
• Simple Strat is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/207662-content-specialist-simple-strat|Content Specialist> :tv:
• Pangea Money Transfer is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/207367-senior-content-marketing-manager-pangea-money-transfer|Senior Content Marketing Manager>
• Gather Content is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/207158-marketing-manager-gather-content|Marketing Manager>
• Plaid is hiring an <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/204850-editor-plaid|Editor>
• Socially Determined is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/204535-content-strategist-socially-determined|Content Strategist>
• Crowd Content is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/202439-content-manager-crowd-content|Content Manager>
• Crayon is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/196250-director-of-content-marketing-crayon|Director of Content Marketing>
• Chili Piper is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/197258-content-marketing-manager-chili-piper|Content Marketing Manager>
• Awesome Motive is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/188076-wordpress-content-writer-remote-awesome-motive-inc|WordPress Content Writer (Remote)>
---
:writing_hand: *freelance projects:*
• Torii is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/207902-freelance-writer-torii|Freelance Writer>
• Fixture Media is hiring <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/199436-freelance-writers-healthcare-welding-videophotography-grillingsmoking-fixture-media|Freelance Writers (Healthcare, Welding, Video/Photography, Grilling/Smoking)> 
• Campfire Labs is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/196806-freelance-writer-remote-campfire-labs|Freelance Writer (Remote)> (:wave: <@U02C74ZGGG0>)
• Chatty is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/194585-freelance-content-editor-chatty|Freelance Content Editor>
---
:female-technologist: *and more from the job board:*
---
• PRovoke Media is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/214812-head-of-content-partnerships-provoke-media|Head of Content Partnerships> :zap:️
• Revmade is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/215033-managing-editor-revmade|Managing Editor> :zap:️
• Panorama Education is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/216143-content-editorial-manager-panorama-education|Content Editorial Manager> (:wave: <@UUJBPA9K5>) :zap:️
• Salesloft is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/211636-director-content-strategy-salesloft|Director, Content Strategy>
• Pitch is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/210972-copywriter-pitch|Copywriter> <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/207902-freelance-writer-torii|(:wave: @Aimee Millwood)>
• Propllr PR and Content Marketing is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/210605-b2b-content-marketing-manager-propllr-pr-and-content-marketing|B2B Content Marketing Manager> (:wave: <@U01CJKV4HE3> & <@U01P36DESHW>)
• Growth Plays is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/208591-content-strategy-operations-and-editorial-lead-growth-plays|Content Strategy Operations & Editorial Lead>
• <http://Draft.dev|Draft.dev> is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/205882-lead-editor-draftdev|Lead Editor>
• CloudApp is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/202629-head-of-marketing-cloudapp|Head of Marketing>
• Megawatt is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/202037-b2b-tech-account-manager-and-strategist-megawatt|B2B Tech Account Manager and Strategist>
• Leapsome is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/199596-social-media-and-community-marketing-manager-leapsome|Social Media & Community Marketing Manager> and a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/199593-pr-and-communications-manager-leapsome|PR & Communications Manager>
• <http://Wordpress.com|Wordpress.com> is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/194377-developer-content-marketing-editor-wordpresscom|Developer Content Marketing Editor> and a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/194376-content-marketing-editor-wordpresscom|Content Marketing Editor> (:wave: <@U02875QT4BC>)
• Shorthand is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/193154-senior-manager-of-demand-generation-shorthand|Senior Manager of Demand Generation>
• Monte Carlo is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/164801-head-of-product-marketing-monte-carlo|Head of Product Marketing>
• On The Map, Inc. is hiring an <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/161228-seo-director-on-the-map-inc|SEO Director>
happy new year!
jimmy
